lines:
6)

Kalen,

1966

3 Jarvis Hall 
Trinity College

Hartford, enn 
Dear her. Stearns

.. d have been spending 
my Lanemer vacation at Hartfordd 
einer guly first. It is my angret 
kat o did not have time to write 
to you constantle.

pon I heard from the Chine 
Legation at Washington that my 
father is coming to America werk 
Prince Traikun, she haval 
Commissioner; and will arrive 
at fan Francisco on Ke 16th of 
September. I hope that you will
raw: 6) Kalen, 1966 3 Jarvis Hall Trinity College Hartford, enn Dear her. Stearns .. d have been spending my Lanemer vacation at Hartfordd einer guly first. It is my angret kat o did not have time to write to you constantle. pon I heard from the Chine Legation at Washington that my father is coming to America werk Prince Traikun, she haval Commissioner; and will arrive at fan Francisco on Ke 16th of September. I hope that you will

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Handwritten letter stating that Kwan has been in Hartford since July 1. He states that his father is to visit with Prince Tsai Hsun, the Naval Commissioner and they will arrive in San Francisco on September 16th. He hopes Stearns will meet his father then. He requests $50 for the Chinese students' conference.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
